name: In Orbit (itch)
description:
Around the one, orbiting clouds are. The other one has them too, all around the big, colorful roundish things they are. Damn it. Wet white thingies in the sky. Fearless, worry free, clouds. Also they have apples. Lots and lots of apples. The clouds don't give fucks, they give apples. They drop them all over the place.

You don't like apples nor clouds. Why would you let such wet floaty bastards just float around doing nothing but dropping apples? Pick them up and throw them right back at them. Yeah. Show them who's the boss.

At some point, eventually, they'll probably just leave, die, or do nothing.

Use W, A, S and D to move around.

Left-Click to throw apples.

Space to jump.

Move the mouse to look around.

Throw apples at the apple-dropping clouds.
